theImmortal:FlameSling.NAME: Flame Sling
theImmortal:FlameSling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! theimmortal:Ignite and 1 Vulnerable. NL theimmortal:Burst: Draw 2 cards.

theImmortal:Scorch.NAME: Scorch
theImmortal:Scorch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL theimmortal:Burst: Deal !D! damage.

theImmortal:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theImmortal:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theImmortal:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theImmortal:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theImmortal:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theImmortal:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theImmortal:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theImmortal:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theImmortal:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theImmortal:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theImmortal:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theImmortal:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theImmortal:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
